alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 12:13PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Goshen, north central Laramie and southeastern Platte Counties through 1245 PM MDT... At 1212 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of Chugwater, or 32 miles southeast of Wheatland, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hawk Springs, Veteran and Slater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County
